coreTogehterLR(Trisentis, Trisentis) - Static method in class trisentis.TriExaminer
Calculates pair in the kernel of a matrix in left Trisentis game which fit together to one in the right Trisentis game so that the border of the result of both matrizes form a zero line between it.
coreTogetherOU(Trisentis, Trisentis) - Static method in class trisentis.TriExaminer
Calculates all pairs of the kernel of two Trisentis games, where the first game is above the second and one row between both games.

G

game - package game
In this package we save the representation of a general sigma-game and have the mathematical methods to calculate solutions and core elements.
Game - Class in game
Describes a sigma-game or lights-out-game on an arbitrary graph.
Game(int) - Constructor for class game.Game
Constructs a new game, only with nodes, without edges.
Game(GameGraph, boolean[]) - Constructor for class game.Game
Constructs a new game on the given graph with the given configuration as start values.
Game(GameGraph) - Constructor for class game.Game
Constructs a new game on the given graph with an empty start configuration (all fields 0).
game - Variable in class gui.AnalyseToolBar
The game which is analysed.
game - Variable in class gui.GameBoard
The game which is the base for the game board.

In the game mode, the player is allowed to do moves on every node.

In the game mode, the player is allowed to do moves on every node.

The GameBoard is kept to show it again if it shall be modified.

The class represents an (undirected) graph.

Creates a new graph with the given number of nodes, all given connections in the adjazenz lists are taken in both directions.
